ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Fifteen: Broken Toys
ComicInfo.Summary: SPECIAL FIFTEENTH ISSUE COLLECTOR'S ITEM! You've heard about it. You've thought about it. All your friends are doing it. Now experience it for yourself: SEX! It's even better than they say it is!
